definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留學生持居留許可在華居住方屬合法。

sentences.english: He asked for extension of his residence permit .
sentences.chinese: 他要求延長居留證的期限。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外國人臨時居留證，發給在中國居留不滿一年的人員。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外國人臨時居留證，發給在中國居留不滿一年的人員。

sentences.english: Each settlement of the Pilgrims was a little piece of the Old World inserted into the New.
sentences.chinese: 每一處清教徒的居留地，都是嵌進新大陸的舊世界。

sentences.english: Officials note most apparently are in this country illegally.
sentences.chinese: 是說這些黑幫的人多數顯然是非法居留者。

sentences.english: Assist the FT to apply for a Foreigner Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 協助外師申請《外國人居留證》。

sentences.english: The applicant should file the application at the place of residence.
sentences.chinese: 申請人應當在居留地提出申請。

sentences.english: Three of them are residents of neighboring Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 其中三人在鄰國瑞典有居留權。

sentences.english: Also submit one copy of your passport or that of your ARC.
sentences.chinese: 請繳交護照或是居留證影本。

sentences.english: After the expiry , the residence permit should be renewed on time with the school letter of introduction .
sentences.chinese: 居留證期滿後應持學校介紹信按時辦理延期手續。

sentences.english: Keep your passport and Residence Permit with you at all times.
sentences.chinese: 留學生外出須隨時攜帶本人護照和居留許可以備查驗。

sentences.english: Non-Chinese citizens are required to submit copy of valid Chinese residence permit.
sentences.chinese: 非中國公民還需要提交您有效的中國居留許可。

sentences.english: An immigration amnesty has enabled many illegal residents in the U.
sentences.chinese: 移民大赦使得部分非法在美居留的人得以重見天日。

sentences.english: Marring a Chinese is the most common way to get a resident status in China.
sentences.chinese: 與中國人結婚是獲得居留權的最常見的方法。

sentences.english: An alien who has lost his /her residence card shall declare the lost card invalid in an official local newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 遺失外國人居留證的，須在當地政府報紙上聲明作廢。

definition: permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
to become naturalized/to become a citizen
Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]
(Tw) to be in the care of one's relatives/to be dependent on a relative/to draw on family connections
overseas Chinese/persons of Chinese origin having foreign citizenship
